thailand.title: 4-Day Thailand Explorer
thailand.description: Experience the best of Bangkok with visits to the Grand Palace, floating markets, and a scenic Chao Phraya River cruise.
thailand.overview: Embark on an unforgettable 4-day journey through Bangkok, Thailand's vibrant capital city. This carefully crafted tour takes you through ancient temples, bustling markets, and serene waterways. Experience the perfect blend of Thai culture, history, and modern city life. From the magnificent Grand Palace to the authentic floating markets, every moment is designed to immerse you in the rich tapestry of Thai traditions.

itinerary.title: Bangkok Arrival
activities: Airport pickup and welcome by our English-speaking guide
Free time to rest and freshen up
Evening Drive go to Chinatown free & dinner at a traditional Thai restaurant

itinerary.title: Grand Palace & Temple Tour
activities: Visit the magnificent Grand Palace complex
Explore Wat Phra Kaew (Temple of the Emerald Buddha)
Visit Wat Pho (Temple of the Reclining Buddha)
Free time for shopping at MBK/Siam Paragon/Platinum Mall

itinerary.title: Floating Market & River Cruise
activities: Early morning departure to Mae Klong Railway Market (Hoop Rom Market)
Boat ride through the colorful floating market
Shopping for local handicrafts and souvenirs
Lunch at riverside restaurant by your own
Afternoon driver will take you back to Bangkok
Visit Icon Siam - Thailand's Luxury reiverside mall with indoor floating market
Evening Enjoy a romantic buffet dinner on the Cruise

includes: 1 lunch & 1 dinner buffet on the cruise
All entrance fees as per itinerary

thailand.title: 5-Day Thailand Paradise
thailand.description: Discover Bangkok city highlights, explore Ayutthaya Historical Park, enjoy Pattaya beaches, visit Coral Island, and experience the famous Alcazar Cabaret Show.
thailand.overview: Experience the ultimate Thai adventure with our 5-Day Thailand Paradise tour. This comprehensive package combines the cultural richness of Bangkok with the beach paradise of Pattaya. Explore ancient temples, witness stunning historical sites at Ayutthaya, relax on pristine beaches, and enjoy world-class entertainment. This tour offers the perfect balance of culture, history, adventure, and relaxation.

itinerary.title: ARRIVAL – PATTAYA – THE SANCTUARY OF TRUTH
activities: Meet the guide and transfer directly to Pattaya.
Visit the impressive Sanctuary of Truth, a 100% wooden architectural masterpiece symbolizing Thai culture, philosophy, and craftsmanship.
Transfer to the hotel for check-in.
Free time at leisure. Dinner on your own and explore Pattaya city at night.

itinerary.title: CORAL ISLAND (KOH LARN) – ALCAZAR SHOW – NIGHT DISCOVERY
activities: Transfer to the pier and take a speedboat to Coral Island (Koh Larn).
Free time for swimming, relaxing, or joining optional water sports (parasailing, sea walking, jet ski…).for your own
Return to the mainland and back to the hotel for refreshment and rest.
In the afternoon, enjoy the world-famous Alcazar Cabaret Show, a colorful and glamorous performance.
Free evening for your own dinner and explore Pattaya nightlife: Walking Street, beach road, café, bars…

itinerary.title: PATTAYA → BANGKOK – GRAND PALACE – WAT PHO
activities: Visit the majestic Grand Palace, home of the Emerald Buddha – the most important royal landmark in Thailand.
Lunch at a local Thai restaurant.
Continue to Wat Pho, famous for the Reclining Buddha and known as the birthplace of traditional Thai massage.
Transfer to the hotel for check-in.
Free evening to relax or explore Bangkok on your own.

itinerary.title: AYUTTHAYA ANCIENT CITY – SHOPPING – CHINATOWN
activities: Depart for Ayutthaya, the ancient capital and UNESCO World Heritage Site.
Visit Wat Mahathat, known for the Buddha head embraced by tree roots.
Visit Wat Lokayasutharam, home to a giant outdoor reclining Buddha.
Free shopping time at MBK Center or Siam Paragon.
Visit Chinatown to enjoy street food and bustling night atmosphere.

itinerary.title: CHECK OUT – CENTRAL VILLAGE OUTLET – AIRPORT DEPARTURE
activities: Visit Central Village Luxury Outlet for last-minute shopping.
Transfer to Suvarnabhumi Airport for your departure flight.
End of services – Thank you & goodbye!

includes: 4 nights accommodation (2 nights Bangkok, 2 nights Pattaya)
All entrance fees as per itinerary

vietnam.title: Hanoi Heritage Tour
vietnam.description: Explore Hanoi Old Quarter, cruise through stunning Halong Bay, enjoy traditional Water Puppet Show, and visit the historic Temple of Literature.
vietnam.overview: Discover the timeless charm of Northern Vietnam with our 4-Day Hanoi Heritage Tour. Journey through Hanoi's atmospheric Old Quarter, where ancient traditions meet vibrant street life. Experience the breathtaking beauty of Halong Bay, a UNESCO World Heritage Site with its thousands of limestone karsts rising from emerald waters. This tour perfectly captures the essence of Vietnamese culture, history, and natural beauty.

itinerary.title: Hanoi Arrival
activities: Airport pickup at Noi Bai International Airport
Transfer to hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter
Afternoon walking tour of Hanoi Old Quarter
Visit Hoan Kiem Lake and Ngoc Son Temple

itinerary.title: Hanoi City Exploration
activities: Visit Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum Complex
Visit Temple of Literature (Vietnam's first university)
Afternoon visit to Vietnam Museum of Ethnology
Evening free to enjoy Hanoi's street food

itinerary.title: Halong Bay Cruise
activities: Board cruise ship and welcome drink
Cruise through Halong Bay's limestone karsts
Dinner on board and overnight on cruise

itinerary.title: Halong Bay & Departure
activities: Tai Chi session on deck at sunrise

includes: 1 night on Halong Bay cruise (deluxe cabin)
Daily breakfast, meals as per itinerary
All transfers by private air-conditioned vehicle
Halong Bay cruise with all activities

vietnam.title: Saigon & Mekong Delta
vietnam.description: Discover Ho Chi Minh City, explore the historic Cu Chi Tunnels, cruise the Mekong River Delta, visit floating markets and Ben Thanh Market.
vietnam.overview: Experience the dynamic energy of Southern Vietnam with our 4-Day Saigon & Mekong Delta tour. Explore the bustling streets of Ho Chi Minh City, delve into history at the Cu Chi Tunnels, and discover the unique water-based lifestyle of the Mekong Delta. This tour offers a perfect blend of urban excitement, historical significance, and rural charm.

itinerary.title: Ho Chi Minh City Arrival
activities: Airport pickup at Tan Son Nhat International Airport
Visit Notre-Dame Cathedral and Central Post Office
Welcome dinner at a rooftop restaurant

itinerary.title: Cu Chi Tunnels & War History
activities: Morning trip to Cu Chi Tunnels (70km from city)
Afternoon visit to War Remnants Museum
Evening free for shopping at Nguyen Hue Walking Street

itinerary.title: Mekong Delta Adventure
activities: Visit local workshops (coconut candy, rice paper)
Return to Ho Chi Minh City

itinerary.title: Departure
activities: Transfer to Tan Son Nhat Airport

includes: All entrance fees as per itinerary

vietnam.title: Vietnam Cross-Country Adventure
vietnam.description: Journey from Hanoi to Ho Chi Minh City, featuring Halong Bay overnight cruise, Hoi An Ancient Town, Hue Imperial City, and multiple UNESCO World Heritage Sites.
vietnam.overview: Embark on the ultimate Vietnamese adventure with our comprehensive 10-Day Cross-Country tour. Travel from the ancient capital of Hanoi to the vibrant metropolis of Ho Chi Minh City, experiencing the incredible diversity of Vietnam along the way. Visit four UNESCO World Heritage Sites, cruise through magnificent Halong Bay, explore the charming ancient town of Hoi An, and discover the imperial grandeur of Hue. This tour showcases the very best of Vietnam's culture, history, cuisine, and natural beauty.

itinerary.title: Hanoi Arrival
activities: Airport pickup at Noi Bai International Airport
Transfer to hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter
Evening walking tour of Hanoi Old Quarter
Welcome dinner with traditional Vietnamese cuisine

itinerary.title: Hanoi City Tour
activities: Visit Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum and Presidential Palace
Afternoon at Vietnam Museum of Ethnology

itinerary.title: Halong Bay to Hanoi, Fly to Danang
activities: Evening free to explore Hoi An Ancient Town

itinerary.title: Hoi An Ancient Town
activities: Walking tour of Hoi An Ancient Town (UNESCO)
Afternoon: Cooking class or lantern making workshop
Free time for shopping and tailoring
Evening: Lantern-lit streets and Thu Bon River

itinerary.title: My Son Sanctuary & Beach
activities: Return to Hoi An for lunch
Afternoon free at An Bang Beach

itinerary.title: Hoi An to Hue via Hai Van Pass
activities: Scenic drive over Hai Van Pass

itinerary.title: Hue Exploration
activities: Visit Royal Tombs (Tu Duc, Khai Dinh)

itinerary.title: Hue to Ho Chi Minh City
activities: Flight to Ho Chi Minh City

itinerary.title: Ho Chi Minh City Departure
activities: Optional: Cu Chi Tunnels half-day tour
Transfer to Tan Son Nhat Airport

includes: Daily breakfast, selected lunches and dinners
All entrance fees as per itinerary
